TopicTitle: mouse over info on map is always underneath the cursor

Articles.Content:
When you hover over a single object (while in Map view) the cursor always obscures the text.

Can you perhaps change the default 'single object' hover display to be above the cursor and fully visible?

Multiple objects are automatically distributed around the cursor.  I suggest that the area defined by the cursor should be a dead zone where no text is displayed.

(Unless there is a setting that I do not know about that enables this)

Edited June 3, 2018 by Wallygator

You can right click and the text stays in place even when you move the cursor away.

But you are right though, it could be useful.
